data.Name: The Knocks
data.Bio: The Knocks are an electronic music duo consisting of Ben "B-Roc" Ruttner and James "JPatt" Patterson. They are known for their own releases on labels such as Kitsun√©, Neon Gold, and A&M Octone-Interscope and for their remixes which feature prominently on HypeMachine, Beatport, and various DJs' setlists. (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Knocks) Read more on Last.fm
